title: Delete a data transfer configuration
description: Deletes a data transfer configuration in the BigQuery Data Transfer Service. Deleting a configuration stops future transfer runs but does not remove data that has already been transferred to BigQuery.

objective.narrative: This sample covers the use case of programmatically removing an existing data transfer configuration. A developer might do this to clean up obsolete transfers, for example, when a data source is retired or a project's data ingestion requirements change. This helps manage resources and prevent unwanted data transfers.
